thread.title: This Game of Thrones throwback is everything
thread.title_full: This Game of Thrones throwback is everything

author: Naomi Gordon
title: This Game of Thrones throwback is everything
text:
Maisie Williams has shared the cutest birthday message to her BFF and Game of Thrones co-star Sophie Turner, along with a throwback snap of the pair taking us right back to the glorious fashion fails of the 00s. The 19-year-old actress posted on her Twitter: "Happy 21st Birthday @SophieT Forever looking up to you, in more ways than one."
Happy 21st Birthday @SophieT
Forever looking up to you, in more ways than one ❤️ pic.twitter.com/43cCih2KeJ
— Maisie Williams (@Maisie_Williams) February 21, 2017
 Awwww, stop!
The photo features a modest-looking Sophie standing up in what looks like a local Waterstones book shop, while Maisie gazes up at her adoringly. But we have to admit, we were a tinsy bit distracted by the painfully early 2000s clothing and accessories adorned by the twosome. We've all been there.
The pashmina.
The headband.
The chunky belt.
The stripy tank top.
The CDs in the background!!
The X Men star responded to Maisie's sweet sentiment with the following reply on Instagram: " @Maisie_Williams nah. Lookin up to you, kid. Love you."
